attributes.action: Stop Ganging Up on those on Benefits
attributes.additional_details:
Stop ganging up on those who claim benefits including "the obese, poor and disabled" by the DWP, Dept Of Health and Government Think tanks - it's so not the best for people who are vulnerable - it's "Old Hat" and a political ploy to play one part of society against another!!
Stop targeting those least able to help themselves after all most people who are now claiming benefits have contributed to this countries health and tax and therefore they are entitled to claim what is rightfully theirs.
When will the Dept Of Health realise that this targeting will just increase the burden on the NHS and any health of the citizens of the UK.

rejection.details: This is not a matter for Government, it is party political material.
